com.pinterest.pinit
Class PinIt

java.lang.Object
  com.pinterest.pinit.PinIt

public class PinIt
extends Object

PinIt an easy to use set of helpers for performing a Pinterest Pin It action. You must obtain a developer ID at http://pinterest.com prior to usage.

Usage:

// Per session
PinIt.setPartnerId("YOUR_PARTNER_ID_HERE");
PinIt.setDebugMode(); // optional

// Per instance
PinIt pinIt = new PinIt();
pinIt.setImageUrl("http://placekitten.com/400/300");
pinIt.setUrl("http://placekitten.com"); // optional
pinIt.setDescription("A place kitten!"); // optional
pinIt.doPinIt(activityContext);

Version:
1.0
Author:
Pinterest, Inc, Carl Rice

PinIt

public PinIt()
Method Detail

doPinIt

public void doPinIt(android.content.Context context)
This invokes the native Pinterest Android app to perform a pin action. If Pinterest is not installed or the installed version does not support this feature the user will be sent to Google Play to install or update before continuing.

Parameters:
context - an Activity context is preferred as we'll be starting an Activity

setDebugMode

public static void setDebugMode(boolean debugMode)
Enable/disable debug mode which will print logs when there are issues.

Parameters:
debugMode - true to enabled, false to disable

setDescription

public void setDescription(String description)
Optional This is only a suggestion and some users may change this text. Tip: Adding a price in the description will signal this is an item for purchase.

Parameters:
description - a suggested Pin description

setImageUri

public void setImageUri(android.net.Uri imageUri)
Required if setImageUrl(String) was not called. The uri of the image file you'd like to Pin.

Parameters:
imageUri - the uri of the image to Pin

setImageUrl

public void setImageUrl(String imageUrl)
Required if setImageUri(Uri) was not called. The url of the image file you'd like to Pin.

Parameters:
imageUrl - the url of the image to Pin

setListener

public void setListener(PinItListener listener)
Set a listener to receive callbacks on actions that occur within this class

Parameters:
listener - a PinItListener

setPartnerId

public static void setPartnerId(String partnerId)
Required This ensures you are a registered partner and allows us to track which Pins are coming from your app.

Parameters:
partnerId - your partner id

setUrl

public void setUrl(String url)
Recommended The url the Pin will link to. For example a product or detail page. It is highly recommended you set this as it will drive traffic back to the intended source page.

Parameters:
url - the url the Pin will link to
